entry.summary: May 16, 2025 3:40 a.m. On Wednesday, the Roseburg Public Schools Board of Directors voted to not renew its sponsorship of Phoenix Charter School, citing concerns over noncompliance with contractual obligations, and state and federal laws. entry.title: DEADLINE APPROACHING TO APPLY FOR A DTO SCHOLARSHIP
entry.summary: May 16, 2025 2:50 a.m. The deadline for students to apply for a scholarship from Douglas Timber Operators is approaching. Applicants must live in Douglas, Coos, or Lane counties and plan to major in a natural resources related field.
